title: Rachel allen's poached eggs benedict with quick hollandaise
ingredients: ['4 fresh eggs', '4 slices hot buttered toast', '8 rashers bacon, grilled', '4 tbsp hollandaise sauce (recipe below)', '1 tbsp finely chopped chives', 'For the hollandaise sauce', '2 egg yolks', '110g (4oz) kerrygold butter, now softer, cut in to roughly 1cm (Â½ inch) dice', '1 tsp lemon juice']
